title: Parent teacher interviews
creator_contributor_role: South Australian Film Corporation, production company
South Australia. Dept. of Education, production company
description: Five encounters which typify the difficulties in communication that often arise in parent-teacher interviews. 1. The Major by Yvonne Graves. Teacher: Brian Victory. Parents: Julie Dawson, Leslie Dayman. - 2. Doctor Lawyer Indian Chief by Brian Bergin. Teacher: Julie Hamilton. Parents: Di Chamerlain, Alan Becher. - 3. A Stranger by Brian Bergin. Teacher: Paul Weingott. Parents: Carol Skinner, Ian Gray. - 4. A Matter of Motivation by Yvonne Graves. Teacher: Colin Myers. Parents: Christine Martin-Murphy, Patrick Frost. - 5. Dear Miss Stevens by Yvonne Graves. Teacher: Noni Hazelhurst. Mother: Mary Taylor.
